comments.comment: Rest in peace, Maya. We love you always.

Rest in peace Maya. She was the best girl ever and will always live in our hearts.
Thanks Pewds and Marzia for being such good parents for her.
Rest in Peace, our Jabba the Hut. :')
The very fact that Maya passed just as Momo was adopted says allot. In a way maybe she felt happy Edgar was gonna have someone with him after she left. And it was ok to go...

Maya just patiently waited for a little sibling to at least somewhat help with the hole she was inevitably going to leave in Felix, Marzia and Edgars hearts. I'm sure Maya told Momo all the tips and tricks on how to make their family the happiest possible. <3 Rest in peace little pupper.
Let’s not forget about Edgar:( him and maya spent so long together, his heart must be hurting:(
Seeing Momo coming, Maya feels safe to go on her own. She is a strong girl.
Felix, you and Marzia gave Maya the best life and the best love any dog could ever have. Sorry for you guys’s loss, sending lots of love ️
You could tell how tired Maya was throughout the video. She sent Momo to them, she knew it was her time. Rest in peace Maya <3 Forever in our hearts

Poor Marzia and Felix. But not poor Maya. She had a great life thanks to you two, far happier and longer than it could have been without you two. I'm sure she went peacefully, knowing the people she cared about most were right there with her.
Love how Pewds went from being an “edgy gamer” to a “wholesome vlogger” truly character development
17 years is a big life for a dog, she’s lucky she got to spend it with you guys
Maya staring at the new pug absolutely tore at my heart strings. It's almost as if she's like okay, I can go now. They'll be okay.
I’m so glad momo met Maya before passing it makes me feel like even in that little time he loved maya just as much and will always remember her
Maya may not be with you forever, but You and Marzia will be Maya's forever, you gave Maya everything she wanted, and everything she deserved, and the love and respect she very much deserved.

The fact Maya lived for 17 years is just a testament to the level of love and care she had received. RIP Maya truely a lucky sweet little pup hope Edgar, Marzia, Felix and even Momo are coping well with the end of Maya's journey.
Lowkey shed a tear at the introduction of Momo. Maya was given an amazing life by you and Marzia - she was always in the best place she could've ever been. Enjoy your walks Maya, wherever you are.
I Wish more dog owner's were like Marzia and Pewdz rest in peace maya.
RIP Maya , will never forget her as I grew up watching the old videos of Pewds where Maya was in Fridays with Pewdiepie
RIP Maya. There's never a good time to say goodbye to such a great friend. I hope you and Marzia and Edgar are doing as well as you can be, and that Momo gives you all hope.
Sorry for your loss Felix and Marzia, losing someone important in your family is hard and sad  but it's understandable to a break and grief the loss.
Maya is also part of our life for us who have followed the channel for years. We love you, Maya, forever in our hearts.
I'm so glad Maya and Momo got to meet <3 and that the family got to share some memories together! all of you. RIP Maya and I wishFelix and Marzia so much patience and courage
The first minute really hit hard… You Marzia and Edgar, really were the best family for Maya. May she have a good time in doggo heaven now :)
I feel like Maya held on until she knew Edgar wouldn’t be alone after she had passed. Such a wonderful pug️
I’m sorry Felix for ur passing and I hope maya is in the great doggy park in the sky

I originally started watching pewdiepie back when he started his first amnesia series, seeing his channel evolve from gaming to memes, to now vlogs, and I love it. He’s truly been more present in my life then even my own father. I can’t appreciate him any more. Also rest in piece maya loved her as if she was my own childhood dog
Maya was the first pug I'd ever seen. Like I didn't know they existed until he pulled her up to the camera once. So sorry for your loss
rest in peace maya she lived good with you guys she is surely thankful for you

Maya outlived the expected lifespan by 2-4 years which is amazing and just shows much well taken care of she have been her whole life  She’s missed by everyone and she’s been part of the channel since the beginning
She stayed with you and held on for 17 years because she loved you, Felix.  You were the best Pug Papa for her.

I feel like maya wanted to make sure you guys were going to be ok without her cause she loves you so much and seeing the new little pup was exactly what she needed  so much love for you and your lovely family Felix
I’ve been watching you since I was 14 and I’m 24 now. Maya was so iconic and such a sweet dog, it’s hard to imagine she’s gone. I’m so sorry for your loss.
Poking my head back into the pewdiepie bubble because I heard about Maya on Instagram and it broke my heart, rip that cutie

I feel like the arrival of Momo made Maya realize that she can finally go in peace because Edgar, Felix and Marzia will be taken care of well.
Rest in peace Maya. You have been a great part of my childhood and adulthood just like Felix. You will always be remembered and loved️

I grew up into a teenager, became an adult, and graduated college watching your content. I followed you since I was 12 and I am now 23, bout to be 24.
I love you guys, every single one of you, including slippy, including Maya, edgar and now Momo.
I send my condolences to you and Marzia. Stay safe, and happy holidays️

In my mind, i’d like to think that Maya knew it was her time once she realized Momo was there to guide you and Marzia the rest of the way️ Condolences to you and Marzia You gave Maya the best life a pug could ever ask for!!
These Japanese vlogs are everything ️ To see Felix and Marizia so chill and happy makes me smile
I literally grew up with Felix & his dogs Edgar and Maya. Hearing the passing of Maya literally felt like i lost one of my own too

I'm sure Maya is content with how things went. She even managed to go with you to Japan. Now Momo will be the new princess... and I'm sure Maya is happy that someone else (besides Edgar) will take care of you and Marzia.

RIP Maya
Momo welcome to the best family you could hope for
Rest in Peace Maya, you were a good dog, maybe even the best.
Rest in peace Maya she's been there since the very beginning, even though it's sad to lost such an amazing pug at least we knew she live a long and happy life
Rest in peace Maya, I know that she's already a old dog but it's still surprising and sad to lose her. I wish healing on Felix, Marzia and Edgar.
Rest in peace Maya thank you for being with Felix, Maria, and Us
It's so sad but it seems as though Maya waited for another sibling that can take her place so Edgar won't be completely alone
My blessings to you, Marzia, and Edgar, I know what its like to loose pets, but to have a furry friend last till age 17, I can't imagine the pain. Hope you and your family recover.
It’s so odd how instantly I wanted to cry when I saw Felix’s puffy eyes… sending a hug Felix! You guys have Maya the best life she could live
So crazy to see Maya gone... I remember coming home from school in 2012 and watching videos when you were still in Italy and seeing such a young Maya. She will be missed

I’ve been here for a few years and Maya and Edgar content is always so exciting to watch. 17 years is such an amazing lifetime for a pug and I’m glad she had the majority of that with such a beautiful family. Welcome Momo and Rest Easy Maya 

P.S. Pewds is getting crazy good with the butterfly knife and the surfing!
Maya is going to be in our hearts forever, we love you Felix and you have all our support
hope you're doing okay Felix, everyone loved Maya and the pain of losing a loved one is unmatched

Rest In Peace Maya, you guys gave her a great life and I’m sure she cherished every moment of those 17 years. I’ve never really watched this channel apart from like three or four videos but I just wanted to stop by to say this. May Maya be protected by her guardian angel in the afterlife and even though I know this type of pain will never go away, I hope you guys deal with this loss in the best possible way.
We will never forget Maya. Rest in Peace.
I've watched you for so long, and always seen Maya along the way. She lived so long because you gave her an amazing life. We'll all remember her forevermore.

It's almost like Maya was waiting for you guys to find another company before she passed. I'm crying seeing momo thinking of this. She had a very happy life with you and Marzia and this is all we can hope for our dogs
13:41  momo looking at maya really hurts for some reason, rest in peace legendary pup

I find it biter sweet that Maya passed so soon after the move. 

She helped the Family settle in and met the new generation.

Its almost like she knew everything was all okay now, and she's done her part.

Rest in Peace Maya. <3

Deepest condolences about Maya, I've been watching the channel regularly since 2013 and was very saddened by the news of her passing, I was fighting back tears at the intro of this video too. Wishing you, Marzia and Edgar the absolute best and hope you carry on living your best lives. Rest in Peace Maya
My condolences for your loss, Felix. I wish you, Marzia, Edgar and Momo continue to live happily as much as possible.

Rest in peace, Maya. I have been her biggest fan since I was a little kid, probably around 7 years old. Now I'm 15 and have just finished the biggest exam of my life. I don't know why, but I started to miss Maya and Edgar, so I Googled them a few minutes ago. Then I found this video and started sobbing real hard... RIP, cute little angel.

I'm glad Maya was able to get to Japan and felt the happiness you feel living there everyday, pewds.  I'm sure seeing you finally living your dream life with her  made her feel all the more happy and content to be a part of it.  Same goes back to you, too.  Rest in peace Maya and stay strong, Pewds.
We’re so sorry guys. Felt like I lost a close little friend. Tons of hugs guys and rest in peace little maya

That shot of momo on the ground looking up to the old and wise maya hit hard. It was like a passing of the torch. Poetic.. in it's own sad way.

Im sorry to learn of her passing. She was stuff of legend and will forever be remembered by the fans. Love you man and take care of yourself and Marzia as well.

Felix seems so happy!! It's so so cool to see how far he's come not just with his channel, but with the things he shares online. He and Marzia are living the dream with their puggies! I'm so in love with their lifestyle <3

Was honestly upset about Maya... I'm so sorry for your lost Pewds, hopefully she'll be at the most beautiful dog park right now running with all of the other dogs there and would be looking down at you. You and Marzia were and still are the best pug parents ever! Been here since Amnesia times, hope you enjoy your life in Japan pewds! We love ya! ️
You gave her such a good life, she was a small piece of your life but you were everything to her.

I'm really sorry for your and Marzia's loss. I'm sorry Edgar lost his big sister that has been his companion for so many years. All your dogs are such sweet, sweet bundles of joy. Rip Maya; you will always be loved, remembered, and missed. Congrats on Momo joining the family, and I'm so happy her and Maya got to meet.

I just still couldn't believe that Maya is gone, but at least she knows that if she's gone, she's gone in peace because There's her replacement so the other especially edgar doesn't get so lonely, and the news of Marzia Pregnancy was also kinda remind them that Maya would always be a Great Blessing in their lifetime
So sorry to hear this Maya was a legend and will always remembered
I remember Maya being introduced as Jabba the Hutt. What a long time it has been, and I'm sure you gave her the love she deserved. I wish you the best my dude.
My 7 year old pet rabbit just past away in my arms yesterday on the morning of New Year’s Eve. I am heartbroken and traumatized. It wasn’t supposed to end like that. RIP bunny ️ RIP Maya

R.I.P. Maya, it was so sad to hear she passed, especially since she was a huge part of the channel and has been there since nearly the start of the channel. She was in the hearts of so many and loved by an entire group of fans and people on the internet and she'll always be in the hearts of Felix, Marzia and I feel in Edgar's too

Maya was a gorgeous dog and you took such good care of her. We had to put our 17 year old dog down the day before Christmas eve so I feel your pain but just remember she had a good life and was loved x
It’s almost like maya saw how well momo was settling in and how much joy she bring you and felt it was ok for her to go. Rip maya sweet girl .

I was so sad when I heard the news of Maya’s passing, but it bring me comfort that she got to know her little sister and that you, Marzia and Edgar won’t feel as alone. All of your dogs are treated so, so well, it warms my heart. Sending lots of love to you and your family, Pewds
Actually cried when Pewds announced the Maya news, she has been a part of all viewers' family
You gave Maya a beautiful life, I'm sure she was a very happy doggy. Saying goodbye to your dogs is one of the hardest things in life, much strength to you Felix, Marzia and Edgar too.
Rest in peace maya, you were the greatest pug in the world and you lived a long and fulfilling life
He seemed so happy in all his videos with his pugs rest in peace maya

I don’t watch your content but I heard your dog died and that’s a really devastating event that can happen in someone’s life and I just wanna say Rest In Peace Maya, she will never be forgotten but forever loved ️️

Your dog lived an insane amount of years for a pug, it speaks volumes of how well you two took care of her
My condolences

Watching Maya live the most wonderful life ever for any pug was so special. She was so loved, and it’s obvious how much you and Marzia loved her. Thank you for sharing her story with us. Rest in peace one eyed baby

Maya sent Momo to continue her work and let you know she is always with you all. You gave her the best life, that's all she could ever have wanted. It hurts, but remember the good memories, they get you through it, thinking of you all.
at 8:23 you can see how pewds looks at marzia with so much love 🥹

Rest easy Maya...
Losing a family member is the worst pain imaginable..
Just know we stand behind y'all in these rough timers, i'm glad you speak out and share your thoughts and emotions with us.
We love you guys <3

I’ve been watching you since 2011 man. I was there for “they call you jabba the hut , for a reasonnnn” and when she was in all the Fridays W Pewdiepie. What an amazing dog and friendship to watch. Much Love to you Pewds, Marzia and puppies. Will miss you maya you beautiful dog
It’s never easy loosing a dog, especially one that’s been with you for 17 years. I’m sorry for your loss Felix and just know that Maya is running around that park waiting

Seeing Maya before she passed hurts my heart. She has been a part of your lives and our lives as 19-year-olds, she could not have better owners than you guys. We are all gonna miss her.

Edit: Welcome to the Pewdiepie family, Momo <3

RIP, Maya. Your legend will forever be kept as long as Pewdiepie exists. She just truly needed the comfort of knowing Felix, Maria and Edgar would be fine after seeing them with Momo. She was like, my job here is done.
Maya helped make this channel soo epic. Lets celebrate how amazing she made this community.

Rest in piece Maya, truly lived long and happy! Huge part of history of Pewds!

She'll live forever on in doggy heaven!

Losing Maya is a huge loss for all of us but in a way it's like Momo came at just the right time to follow in Maya's footsteps and make the grief a little more bearable, if fate exists maybe that's it
Rest in peace Maya AKA Puga AKA JabbatheHutt, you were such a big part of my childhood. You were the best girl ever  thanks for looking over Felix and Marzia.
I loved seeing how happy pewds looked before mayas passing  my condolences. I wish you and your family well
Rest in peace Maya. It's almost like she knew that after Momo came, she can now rest easy
Rest in peace Maya. I hope Edgar is adapting well. I am sure he will feel the absence of Maya. Breaks my heart. =,(

The timing of Maya's passing is extremely sad but also beautiful. I think Maya has been watching over you both from the start and had been holding out for a long time so that she could see you both get to where you are now. To see you rest, explore, have freedom and peace in Japan where you have been wanting to go to and make a new life and home for such a long time. I'm sure bringing Momo into you, Marzia and Edgar's life was reassurance for Maya that she could rest and know that life will move on, and although she will never be forgotten, new memories and new life can be made in place of her absence rather than loneliness. Words can't describe how sorry I am for your loss but I'm hopeful of the new love, joy and compassion in your life that I'm sure Maya could feel from the moment she met Momo, allowing her to rest and know that the loss of her life would not mean the loss of any love.
Rest in peace maya. She was a legend, currently got an old dog as well, so I'll pray that Maya goes to a nice place

Made me feel that Maya held out long enough for MoMo to come home so she can rest freely for Edgar, Felix and Marzia to not get lonely..

My heartfelt condolences. Knowing her passing is like learning that your good friend that you hang out often has passed away.

Maya is a good doggo and deserves the best up there.
Some parts in this video make me think pewds is the happiest person alive, rest in peace Maya. We will miss you.

Being an old fan during the days of horror games and funny edits with the dogs.. really brought me so much joy and laughter.. i seen Maya grown to being a cute pug to a cute adult pug. I always wanted a pug of my own but we are taking care of a 13 year old Beagle and i am scared that he might not live much longer. His health is getting to him slowly but i take care of the dog more than his owner does, which is just sad. I'll miss Maya though. R.I.P

R.I.P. Maya, may her barks echo through the ages. I can't even believe people are saying such cruel shit over her dying, saying PewDiePie "deserved it" when he really didn't. I hope you're doing ok, and I hope Maya is doing good in heaven. Momo looks adorable, by the way.

Im sorry for your loss pewds just know that you
 made her life as enjoyable as possible before passing, we all love you  and maya <3

It is a heartbreak to lose a dog after such a long time, I remember that day you got Maya, I don't know how long it has been, but I know it is over 10 years ago, but it is a heartbreak I feel for you, in early october, I lost my Australian Shepherd that I have for almost 13 years, when I learned she passed away, I couldn't go to work because I got too emotional for work. It is pretty much losing a family member, I am terribly sorry for your loss to both Felix and Marzia, she lived an happy and it is the most important for a dog, you are everything to her.️
Maya had a full, happy life. You guys took amazing care of her and gave her a great life. Rest In Peace to the goodest girl ever
This is just so sad bro like we have seen maya for so damn long that seeing her go is just depressing to see but seeing the new baby chug just brought a whole new chapter to pewdiepie’s story.
That was a really sincere and meaningful opening. I hope that you and Marzia are doing well during this difficult time.
I’ve been a fan for so long and I can’t imagine how Felix must’ve felt, such a tough but surreal experience. Much love Pewds we keep on going
I'm so sorry for your loss Felix, Maya had a wonderful life thanks to you, Marzia, Edgy, and Momo!! She was loved and will be remembered by millions all around the world ️

Felix, i am so sorry for your loss and Marzias as well I remember when i watched you all the way back not even close to 100m subs i remember maya coming into ur videos a lot, your old house and the house before that as well. I am so sorry i wish you two the best and im sure maya is watching you from heaven stay strong <3
We’re all here for you pewds sorry for your loss maya was an amazing dog that brought smiles to millions
We love you, Maya. Rest in peace. Each one of my precious childhood memories. She is gonna be in our heart. I hope Felix, Marzia, Edgar and Momo are doing okay <3
Been watching your channel for such a long time. Maya will always remain the best pug in my heart. My condolences to you, Marzia and Edgar.
A dog is never just a dog, a dog is part of your family and brings joy to you every day and is there for your biggest moments.
Maya brought so much love and happiness to everyone. She seemed like such a sweet doggo. Wishing you and Marzia the bestalso Momo is so adorable! Her and Edgar are gonna be best buddies!
RIP Maya. somebody once said to me "if you want loyalty in life get a dog", so true.
this must be hardest on edgar, hope you guys all pull through and can soon find peace with this sudden news, merry christmas and happy new year felix
